definition: to immerse oneself in/engrossed in sth/to lower the head (e.g. to avoid rain)/countersunk (of screws, rivets etc)
head/hair style/the top/end/beginning or end/a stub/remnant/chief/boss/side/aspect/first/leading/classifier for pigs or livestock/CL:個|个[ge4]
to bury oneself in work (idiom); to be engrossed in work/to make an all-out effort/up to the neck in work

sentences.english: Since 2002 she has drowned herself in the study of American literature.
sentences.chinese: 從2002年以來她一直埋頭研究美國文學。

sentences.english: Jim was so engrossed in his computer games that he did not hear his mother call.
sentences.chinese: 吉姆埋頭玩電腦遊戲，一點都沒有聽到母親的叫喚聲。

sentences.english: Aster and Hoban had their heads bent over a sketch for the battle account.
sentences.chinese: 埃斯特和胡班已經在埋頭搞一份附在戰報中的略圖。

sentences.english: He thought of all the times he had gone about his work without thinking about and noticing her.
sentences.chinese: 他想起了那些埋頭工作，置愛妻子於不顧的日子。

sentences.english: Do you plod through the day at the office?
sentences.chinese: 你是否在辦公室裏埋頭苦幹了一整天呢？

sentences.english: The young man bowed his head and bent over his ledger again.
sentences.chinese: 那個年輕人點頭應諾，然後又埋頭寫起分類帳。
埋頭工作是成年人的事情。

sentences.english: She is grubbing about among the records.
We laid down our bikes along the round tables and dug in.
sentences.chinese: 我們把自行車靠在圓桌上，開始埋頭喫飯。

sentences.english: I was going to dive in and become a full-time healing junkie.
sentences.chinese: 我打算埋頭探究併成爲一個全職的治療狂人。

sentences.english: I like your down-to-earth and hardworking spirit.
sentences.chinese: 我就喜歡你們這股紮紮實實埋頭苦幹的勁兒。

sentences.english: They have begun the long and tiresome grind of preparing themselves for college entrance.
sentences.chinese: 他們已經開始考大學前那種長期而勞累地埋頭苦學了。

sentences.english: He is immersed in his work, in order to recovers from the pain of lossing parents.
sentences.chinese: 他埋頭工作爲的是要從失去雙親的痛苦中恢復過來。

sentences.english: With a groan he plunged back into his book.
sentences.chinese: 他哼了一聲，又埋頭讀他的書去了。

sentences.english: Working too hard will just delay that process.
sentences.chinese: 而埋頭工作只會推遲這一天的來臨。

sentences.english: At the shoe factory she put in a long day.
sentences.chinese: 她在製鞋廠埋頭工作了一整天。
